title: Alex Murdaugh's attorneys file notice of appeal in double murder case
description: Alex Murdaugh's attorneys have filed a notice of appeal for the former lawyer's convictions and sentences on Thursday, court records show.

title: Multiple people shot at church in Germany: Police
description: Multiple people have been shot, some fatally, at a church in Germany Thursday night, police said.

title: WATCH:  Former social worker makes custom dolls to ensure all kids are represented
description: Amy Jandrisevits is the founder of "A Doll Like Me," a nonprofit organization that designs dolls with the unique features of the children who receive them.

title: Ex-police chief convicted in 4 arsons targeting his enemies
description: A Maryland jury returned a guilty verdict Thursday against a former police chief accused of setting fire to buildings belonging to his adversaries

title: Michigan legislature passes bill overturning 1931 abortion ban
description: The Michigan legislature passed a bill overturning the 1931 abortion ban that made it illegal to advertise, sell or administer abortion drugs.

title: Harriet Tubman monument unveiled in Newark
description: Harriet Tubman was honored with a monument in Newark that replaces a Christopher Columbus statue.

title: WATCH:  Dogs watch as new cat takes their spot on the couch
description: Rhaenyra the cat is settling into her new family home.

title: 8-year-old girl missing since 2018 found safe in Mexico: FBI
description: An 8-year-old girl from Washington state who had been missing for over four years after her biological mother kidnapped her was found in Mexico, authorities said.

title: Mexican cartel allegedly takes responsibility for kidnapping of 4 Americans
description: Gulf Cartel, a powerful Mexican cartel, has allegedly taken responsibility for the kidnapping of four U.S. citizens and killing of two of them in Matamoros.

title: Power company accused of stonewalling in probe of power station attacks
description: The FBI offered up to $50,000 in new rewards for information on those responsible for sabotaging three North Carolina power plants in December and January.

title: Car repair prices are rising much faster than overall inflation. Here's why.
description: Motor vehicle repair prices have jumped a staggering 23% over the last year, an inflation rate nearly four times higher than overall price increases.

title: Visa, Mastercard pause decision to track gun shop purchases
description: Visa and Mastercard paused their decision to start categorizing purchases at gun shops, a significant win for conservative groups and Second Amendment advocates who felt that tracking gun shop purchases would inadvertently discriminate against legal fi...

title: Keystone pipeline faces new federal order after major oil spill
description: Oil spills from the Keystone pipeline have become more frequent and severe, a federal agency said.

title: UN leader: Taliban's restrictions on Afghan women 'have to be reversed'
description: Amina Mohamed spoke to ABC News Live about the crisis Afghan women are facing and the U.N.’s ongoing humanitarian work in the country.

title: Average US mortgage rate up for fifth straight week to 6.73%
description: The average long-term U.S. mortgage rate rose for the fifth straight week to its highest level since breaching 7% in November, just as the spring buying season gets ready to kick off

title: First Navajo Nation President Peterson Zah dies at 85
description: Former Navajo Nation leader Peterson Zah made his mark on Native American education.

title: Man wrongfully imprisoned for over 18 years due to photo lineup mistake: DA
description: A deceptive photo lineup helped imprison Sheldon Thomas for over 18 years for a fatal shooting he did not commit, according to the Brooklyn district attorney.

title: Norfolk Southern CEO faces Senate grilling over Ohio toxic train derailment
description: Norfolk Southern CEO Alan Smith is slated to testify Thursday before a Senate Committee in Washington in the wake of the toxic train derailment in East Palestine, Ohio.

title: Biden rolls out 2024 budget amid debt ceiling showdown
description: The budget would reduce the deficit by nearly $3 trillion and include a record amount of defense spending, the White House said.

title: Former Trump official launches PAC urging DeSantis to run
description: A former White House official who helped implement Donald Trump’s hardline immigration policies has broken ranks with the former president

title: GM offers buyouts to most US salaried workers to trim costs
description: General Motors is offering buyouts to most of its U.S. salaried workforce and some global executives in an effort to trim costs as it makes the transition to electric vehicles

title: Why is Indonesia moving its capital from Jakarta to Borneo?
description: Authorities unveiled the site of the country’s new capital this week.

title: Transgender health care is now protected in this state
description: Gov. Tim Walz signed an executive order protecting transgender health care in Minnesota.

title: Applications for US jobless aid rise by most in 5 months
description: The number of Americans applying for unemployment benefits last week jumped by the most in five months, but layoffs remain historically low as the labor market continues to be largely unaffected by the Federal Reserve’s interest rate hikes

title: NATO chief in new drive to bring Finland, Sweden in
description: NATO Secretary-General Jens Stoltenberg is spearheading a new drive to see Finland and Sweden join the alliance's ranks soon

title: 3 mine workers die in Spain after being trapped underground
description: Spanish firefighters say that three workers died after becoming trapped 900 meters (3,000 feet) underground in a potash mine in the northeastern Catalonia region

title: North Korea fires ballistic missile toward sea, Seoul says
description: South Korea’s military says it has detected that North Korea fired a short-range ballistic missile toward waters off its western coast

title: Shell CEO pay up 50% as soaring energy prices boosted profit
description: The pay package for Shell’s CEO jumped by half last year to nearly $12 million

title: Feds looking into Norfolk Southern's handling of additional reported hazmat concern
description: Federal regulators are looking into Norfolk Southern's handling of an additional reported hazmat concern, just weeks after the derailment in East Palestine, Ohio.

title: Maine motorists appeal to keep naughty vanity license plates
description: A handful of motorists in Maine are appealing to keep their custom license plates after the state cracked down on naughty words, including unabbreviated expletives

title: Chaim Topol, Israeli actor known for Fiddler's Tevye, dies
description: His cause of death was not immediately released.

title: Former NBA great Shawn Kemp arrested on felony drive-by shooting charges
description: Former Seattle Supersonics star and NBA great Shawn Kemp has been arrested for his involvement in a drive-by shooting at a mall, police say.

title: Georgia withdraws foreign agent bill after days of protests
description: Georgia’s ruling party says it is withdrawing a draft law from the parliament criticized as potentially stifling media freedom and civil society

title: Man who killed 4 during Houston drug robbery faces execution
description: A Texas inmate is facing execution for the drug-related killings of four people more than 30 years ago

title: Mitch McConnell hospitalized after fall at DC hotel
description: Senate Minority Leader Mitch McConnell has been hospitalized following a fall at a Washington, D.C., hotel, his team said.

title: 3 LAPD officers shot, 'ongoing' scene with gunman: Chief
description: Three LAPD officers were shot Wednesday night in Los Angeles, the chief of police said.

title: WATCH:  Infant meets woman whose organ donation saved her life
description: Second time organ donor Lori Seitz anonymously donated a piece of her liver, which ended up saving baby Emma's life.
